sentences: Kirk Leroy Miller professionally known as Leroy Miller (born February 19, 1965) is an American musician from Spokane, Washington.
In the summer of 2008, he joined Smash Mouth as a guitarist to replace Greg Camp, who had just left the band.
In 2003, he appeared on John Mayer's album Heavier Things, performing additional programming on the track "Split Screen Sadness".
